ProductInfo.Features:
The latest Operation System Android 4.1.1 Jelly Bean: The new operation system Google Android 4.1.1 improves on the speed and simplicity of Android 4.0 and includes all new features, so everything on this unit feels fast, fluid, and smooth. Moving between home screens and switching between apps is effortless, like turning the pages of a book.
CPU RK2926 ARM Cortex A9 & GPU Mali 400 MP Multi-core: The CPU of RK2926 has Low power consumption, high performance, reliable for Android tablets. Class leading anti-aliasing capabilities, ensuring optimal image quality with GPU of Mali 400 MP Multi-core .
9mm Ultrathin Body: Ultra-light-weight, one of the most light tablet, suitable for holding in one hand.
Customizable in your own way: You can customize this tablet with an array of external devices to have endless entertainment.
ProductInfo.Name: iRulu 7 inch 5-Point Capacitive 800*480 Pixels Resolution Touch Screen Android 4.1 Tablet PC, ARM Cortex-A9 1.2 GHz CPU, Dual Camera 512MB RAM 16GB ROM Tablet-White
